Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
The home you have always dreamed of but can never find is now on the market. An absolute credit to its current owners this magnificent single storey residence provides everything you could ever wish for and more. At approximately 32 squares, its impressive size is matched by the huge number of standout features you are greeted with at every turn. Ingeniously designed, the quality kitchen with glass splashback, stone benches , WIP and 900mm appliances overlooks the family , dining and formal lounge with all these areas encompassing the magical alfresco area with bi-fold door which when opened creates an enormous indoor/outdoor zone. Other highlights include luxurious master bedroom with WIR and oversize shower, double vanity ensuite and a sensational theatre room to the rear. Additional features include 3 more bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a quality main bathroom, separate study or nursery just off the master bedroom, enormous garage with remote and rear roller door access to undercover carport for a boat, trailer or caravan , ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security alarm system, high ceilings, down lights, established mature gardens with great size rear yard, top of the range solar panel system, quality window furnishings, indoor/outdoor speakers and so much more. All this on a massive allotment of approximately 624sqm in a great location right around the corner from all amenities.
Insights: 30 Northam Green, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Positioned on just under 600sqm of land, this home presents an affordable opportunity for buyers that require size and space. The home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, master with huge WIR and ensuite, modern open plan kitchen overlooking the dining and main living area and separate lounge that can be easily converted to a 4th bedroom to suit any buyers particular requirements. Moving outside you are greeted with a concreted outdoor entertainment area with pergola that spills into an enormous rear yard space offering not only all the outside space you could ever desire but the added bonus of possible side access and great future price growth as we all know the money is in the land. Other features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double remote garage with internal access and a fantastic location literally a few steps around the corner from schools, transport, parkland and community centre.
Insights: 14 Fernhurst Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
SPACE, STYLE & A LOACTION TO ENVY
Located in a quiet court location close to all amenities including public transport, schools and shops. This double storey town house represents a fantastic rare opportunity for first homebuyers, downsizers or investors. Comprising of three great sized fitted bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite. Space to relax and play is all sorted with two spacious living areas including a spacious formal lounge and an open plan meals / living overlooking a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. Outside hosts a good-sized backyard perfect for entertaining all year round. Additional features include central bathroom, laundry, single remote garage, ducted heating, split system cooling plus much more. Currently tenanted on a month-to-month basis returning $1413 per calendar month. Be quick, as this home won't last long.

Description:
When only the best will do.
Family living in Derrimut has a new benchmark. Combining cutting-edge design and high quality fittings, this 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom home will take your breath away. Set on a generous size block, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations. The interior is instantly eye-catching with its wide entrance flowing throughout the ground level.
The gourmet kitchen highlights the home's luxury and detail with a caesarstone bench and ample cupboard storage. The very best stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooker, glass splashback and a walk-in pantry.
Comprising of five great-sized bedrooms, retreat to master with large ensuite, separate study with its own balcony, dining area and adjoining spacious family room. Enjoy your favourite movies in your own theatre room, or entertain family and friends outside with the decked alfresco area together with the Bali inspired gazebo. Upstairs there is a great-sized secondary lounge room which is ideal for a children's retreat. Other features include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, video intercom, second kitchen, external gas line for your BBQ, 5 star rating batts in all walls and ceilings, plantation shutters, beautiful landscaped front and rear gardens.
The home is ideally located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to Balmoral Park, schools, transport, freeway and a choice of shopping precincts. Nothing could be finer.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
THE PINNACLE OF PERFECTION
Sale by Set Date 6/11/2015
This absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family luxury living, close to schools, transport, ring road and freeway access.
This Carlisle home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 4 lavish bedrooms, 2 stunning bathrooms, a study as well as a generous ensemble of living rooms.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with soaring high ceilings. A decadent master suite complete with a dressing room, large spa ensuite which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
The property also comprises a generous study, dining area, casual living room and rumpus room. The gourmet kitchen includes top quality stainless steel appliances and Miele dishwasher, Caesar stone bench tops and quality tiled splashback.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of an alfresco area with bi-fold doors.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 2 cars with storage, refrigerated heating/cooling and established landscaping contributes to this fine property.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
That perfect residence we are forever looking for but can never find, is finally on the market. On a massive allotment of approximately 791sqm this huge single level Porter Davis home provides all the indoor and outdoor space you could ever desire. Upon entering the ultra modern interior will amaze and have you saying MAYBE, then the clincher will come once you step outside to find the quality, modern touches and luxury refinements unbelievably goes up another level with the magnificent salt chlorinated in ground pool, outdoor kitchen and vast outdoor spaces that seamlessly combine with the inside just blowing you away and having you screaming YES. The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the lavish master with WIR , twin vanity ensuite and double shower, upgraded kitchen with thick stone benches, glass and mirror splashback, 900mm appliances and huge walk in pantry that overlooks the dining and main living area. Other features include separate study, theatre room, formal lounge/rumpus room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, high ceilings, alarm, gorgeous flooring, landscaped front and rear gardens with extensive decking, double remote garage and so much more. For those that like the finer things in life, the ultimate package in family living and entertaining is there for the taking.
Insights: 6 Lincoln Drive, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
Luxurious Family Home
Enter this truly stunning residence set among other vibrant homes in what is widely considered to be one of the prime locations in Derrimut. Well presented and fantastically designed with sizeable living areas, this house will tick all the boxes for luxurious family living.
The 'Wow' features will catch your eyes with a wide entrance that leads to a great sized study, formal lounge, rumpus, open plan living adjoining the spacious dining/meals area. The kitchen with its L-shaped island bench has convenient access to the alfresco for indoor/outdoor living and entertaining. The kitchen itself has a large walk-in-pantry and stone bench tops with 900 mm European cooker and plenty of cupboards to fill.
Upstairs, the master suite provides W.I.R and large en-suite with double vanities, room for your own parents retreat, balcony with city views. Three other large bedrooms have B.I.R's and access to a separate bathroom and separate toilet. A large open space makes an ideal private lounge.
Features include heating, cooling, high ceilings, and double remote control garage with internal access. This family friendly home is only a stone's throw from all amenities including Derrimut Village, I.G.A shop, schools, parks, and freeway access, just to name a few. This home will surely impress. Inspections are a must.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Low Maintenance Modern Living
Stylish light filled spaces and a relaxed modern ambience combine in this superb home built to the highest standards. This 4 year old home comprises a beautiful modern kitchen featuring top quality appliances overlooking the dining and family rooms with direct access to the entertaining area and the fully landscaped backyard, formal lounge/theatre room, spacious master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, powder room, sparkling central bathroom and double garage. Additional features include: high ceiling, spa bathtub, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and much more for your convenience. All this perfectly positioned close to all local amenities, a selection of schools, parklands and the Western Ring Road. Call us today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Offering spectacular parkland views this massive double storey home really delivers where it counts with a superb kitchen and breathtaking master bedroom being absolute highlights of the residence. Accommodating the largest of families the home also comprises 3 additional bedrooms with BIRs, 2 quality bathrooms plus downstairs powder room, open plan dining/living area leading to lovely alfresco area, separate rumpus and lounge room, upstairs retreat and double garage with remote. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, floorboards, ducted vacuum, alarm, landscaped gardens, stone bench tops, quality appliances, spa, and additional pergola with decking on a large block of approximately 633sqm situated directly in front of a magnificent recreation reserve.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate proudly present 3 Bowood Court Derrimut, a premier single level residence for the area. By renowned builder Metricon this huge home offers all the size and space you will ever need complimented by amazing outside spaces. Sit back, relax and feel pampered in luxury by the amazing master bedroom with fitted WIR and exquisite ensuite featuring thick stone bench double vanity and the high end touches of an enormous shower and spa rivalling any 5 star hotel. A quality kitchen with glass splashback, 900mm appliances and stone benches overlooks the dining and main living area with floor to ceiling windows flooding this area with natural light and providing fantastic views of the magnificent rear yard. Other features include 3 additional bedrooms of enormous proportions serviced by the main bathroom, huge rumpus/theatre room, separate study, formal lounge at the front of the property, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, modern contemporary flooring, high ceilings, high doors, down lights, alarm, extra oversized garage with rear roller door access to the rear and large low maintenance front and rear gardens. All this on a massive allotment of approximately 606sqm in a quiet family friendly court situated a short stroll from schools, parkland, transport, golf club, Derrimut Village shopping centre and Deer Park train station. The ultimate package in family living awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
A Spacious Family Home in a Top Location!
Absolutely enticing to all, this Porter Davis built family home is completed from front to back leaving nothing to do but to move in and enjoy. Behind the striking facade awaits a superb selection of formal and informal living zones, highlighted by open-plan casual living/meals area overlooking beautiful gardens.
Features 4 living areas including study/5th bedroom, a comfortable main bedroom retreat with ensuite and walk -in wardrobe, a 2nd,3rd and a further 4th bedroom well serviced by a light filled central bathroom. Further features include; well appointed kitchen with stone benches, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down-lights throughout and double garage.
Located in one of Derrimut's most coveted locations, this outstanding residence is only 20 minutes to the CBD and has every modern day requirement at your disposal.
AUCTION SATURDAY 19TH SEPTEMBER AT 2:30PM
Contact Gioan Pham 0422 804 082
